posts.title: California Governor Gavin Newsom Shares Framework for Reopening the State
posts.brief: Social distancing measures will still be in place but Newsom hopes to start easing some restrictions.
posts.author: Jenni Fink

comments.content: He basically said the same thing President Trump is saying. Hoping, trying, listening to experts and wait and see. But, it’s better than bad news hope they can both accomplish their plans.

authors.name: Jenni Fink
authors.title: Chief Reporter, Breaking News
authors.about: Jenni Fink joined the Newsweek team in July 2018 and is a staff writer on the breaking news team. She graduated from the University of Arizona and had her first book, 'Sentenced to Life,' published in 2015.

opinions.title: China Hawks Are Calling Coronavirus Their Smoking Gun. Don't Buy It

sponsored.title: Weathering the Perfect Storm
sponsored.brief: COVID-19 is not our only enemy. While the world confronts a pandemic, our critical infrastructure is vulnerable to cyberattack. Read this new report on where the weak points are and how to strengthen defenses against terrorists and cyber-criminals.
